name: Lone Warrior
description:
A lone warrior.........
Must overcome and defy the odds ( and maybe some logic as well....) and defeat every enemy thrown at him. Zombies and Cyborgs stand between him and total victory. He must use all his available ammo and grenades and blow these losers to smithereens .....

Made for Weekly game jam #130 where the theme was : "Dying is awarded"
Every time you die, you may come back with a different ammo type along with your grenades being re-stocked. You have 2 grenades each time you come back
The game ends when your total points cross 1000
Controls:
left and right arrow = movement
up arrow = jump
z = shoot with current ammo type ( also mapped to down arrow)
x = throw grenades ( also mapped to right shift )
right control = macho celebration ;)
E = quit the applicationPress Up Arrow when you die to respawn

Note:
- In the current jam version, there aren't any sound effects
